title: 3 Pcs Sofa Slipcover Set for Couch Cushion Couch Cover with Skirt Durable Washable High Elastic Stretchable Furniture Covers for Sofa Loveseat Couch Arm Chair(Navy Blue)
description: Features:  Appropriate for Various Settings: Our 3 piece sofa cover set is ideal in more place than just your living room. It is equally right at home in shopping malls, entertainment rooms, art studios and so on. It can protect your sofa, serving as a tasteful addition to your space.  Ideal Color: Stretch sofa cover is available in versatile and classy shades, ensuring it blends well with just about interior. The sophisticated look of the colors add a touch of luxury to the surroundings.  Specifications: Material: 95% polyester and 5% spandex Color: navy blue Size: Single 35.43 x 55.12 inches/ 90 x 140 cm Double 55.12 x 70.87 inches/ 140 x 180 cm Triple 70.87 x 90.55 inches/ 180 x 230 cm  Package includes: 1 X single sofa cover 1 X double sofa cover 1 X Sofa Covers for 3 Cushion Couch  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
